pkgmetadata.longdescription: Self-Normalization(SN) Based Change-Point Estimation for Time Series // Implementations self-normalization (SN) based algorithms for change-points estimation in time series data. This comprises nested local-window algorithms for detecting changes in both univariate and multivariate time series developed in Zhao, Jiang and Shao (2022) doi:10.1111/rssb.12552.
